sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When the user select the Environment, a calendar open up and shows the availabile time slot based on the type of Env.</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>requested</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Sam Hassani">3937d13e4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c735</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="BrightStarr" name="BrightStarr">2b33a4124fa463007e72aa95d310c7c7</assignment_group> <category/> <company display_value="BrightStarr">c507ddfa4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c79b</company> <description>When a deployment request is being raised, after the user selects the Environment, a calendar for booking the implementation time will be shown, allow the user to select: 2 hours time slot for Production 1 day booking for QA / Staging The calendar will show avaialblity by the hour when each time slot is for 2 hours (8:00 - 10:00, 9:00 - 11:00, etc) The calendar will show availability time based on the availability of engineer and other bookings</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 05:00:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001143</number> <package display_value="PACK0001018">b395341f4f6027007e72aa95d310c7fc</package> <short_description>Book Time - Calendar view</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-27 09:36:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0e9e13214f3c67007e72aa95d310c772</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-27 09:36:41</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
